data.description:
## ⚠️ START ON NEW THREAD - Complex Multi-File Refactor

## Overview
Clean removal of legacy event-sourced backend after migration to TX. This is a COMPLEX task affecting 49+ files.

## Related Tasks (Must Coordinate)
- T-20251222-145525-445df343: Remove deprecated EventLog and GoTProjectManager classes (DUPLICATE - consolidate)
- T-20251223-094031-cbed056c: Remove protobuf package (can be done together)

## Scope Analysis

### Code to Remove (~2,400 lines)
| Component | Lines | Location |
|-----------|-------|----------|
| EventLog class | ~762 | scripts/got_utils.py |
| HandoffManager | ~114 | scripts/got_utils.py |
| GoTProjectManager | ~1,473 | scripts/got_utils.py |
| TaskMigrator | ~85 | scripts/got_utils.py |
| **Total** | ~2,434 | |

### Files Affected (49 found)
- scripts/got_utils.py (6,232 lines - main target)
- tests/behavioral/test_got_workflow.py
- tests/integration/test_got_handoffs.py
- tests/integration/test_got_migration.py
- tests/integration/test_got_migration_failures.py
- tests/regression/test_got_edge_rebuild.py
- tests/unit/test_got_cli.py
- tests/unit/test_got_query.py
- Multiple documentation files referencing EventLog/GoTProjectManager

### CLI Commands Needing Update
- cmd_migrate_events: Uses EventLog.load_all_events()
- cmd_validate: Uses EventLog.load_all_events()
- cmd_compact: Uses EventLog methods
- cmd_handoff_*: Uses HandoffManager(manager.event_log)

## Concerns & Risks
1. **Test Coverage**: Multiple test files depend on GoTProjectManager
2. **CLI Breakage**: Several commands use EventLog directly
3. **Documentation Drift**: 10+ doc files reference these classes
4. **Handoff Logic**: HandoffManager may have behavior not in TX adapter
5. **Migration Scripts**: migrate_got.py may be needed for users

## Recommended Approach
1. Run full test suite first - establish baseline
2. Verify all TX adapter methods match GoTProjectManager behavior
3. Update CLI commands to use TX adapter exclusively
4. Update/delete obsolete tests one file at a time
5. Remove classes in order: HandoffManager → EventLog → GoTProjectManager
6. Update documentation last

## Verification
```bash
python scripts/got_utils.py validate  # Must pass
python -m pytest tests/ -v  # Full suite
grep -r 'EventLog\|GoTProjectManager' --include='*.py' | wc -l  # Should be 0
```
data.title: Remove GoTProjectManager and event-sourced backend
